title: A day at the fair
seo_description: Enjoy the Frieze New York contemporary art fair with our "A Day at the Fair" package which includes luxurious accommodation plus 2 tickets to the Frieze fair.
seo_title: Frieze New York Hotel Package | Offers at WestHouse Hotel
contents:
FRIEZE NEW YORK - May 5 to 7, 2017


Frieze New York is one of the world's leading contemporary art fairs. Throughout the first weekend of May, Frieze New York brings together the most exciting contemporary galleries from around the globe. We invite you to make WestHouse your House away from Home during Frieze and enjoy 2 complimentary one-day tickets at the fair.
